info.name: asmb - awesome -- The original transparent theme
info.description:
black, transparent, awesome


screenshot: http://imgur.com/Kmcsf.png

features

----removes bear, replaces it with awesome
----removes scrollbars in signatures
----replaces eyes with awesome
----removes float buttons
----removes ugly coloring
----removes webcam
----removes stupid IB header pictures
----all images save for background (and avatars) cached locally in base64 for faster page loading

- the original transparent ASMB theme from which all the others are based off of (thanks for not giving any credit for my work, the rest of you)
